name: txtopi

stmt.origin: mp2an(wcel(co(c0, ctx, c1), ctop), wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop))
stmt.pretty: mp2an((c0[tX]c1)∈ Top, c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈ Top)

body.origin:
|- wcel(co(c0, ctx, c1), ctop)
-| wcel(c0, ctop)
-| wcel(c1, ctop)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop)), wcel(co(c0, ctx, c1), ctop))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0[tX]c1)∈ Top
⊣ c0 ∈ Top
⊣ c1 ∈ Top
⊣ ((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈ Top)→(c0[tX]c1)∈ Top)

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(co(c0, ctx, c1), ctop)
-| wcel(c0, ctop)
-| wcel(c1, ctop)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop)), wcel(co(c0, ctx, c1), ctop))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0[tX]c1)∈ Top
⊣ c0 ∈ Top
⊣ c1 ∈ Top
⊣ ((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈ Top)→(c0[tX]c1)∈ Top)

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop)), wcel(co(c0, ctx, c1), ctop))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(co(c0, ctx, c1), ctop)
-| wcel(c0, ctop)
-| wcel(c1, ctop)

comment: The product of two topologies is a topology. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 15-Jun-2010.)
